Character Select

  • StatsMove:3Attack:1Defend:3Skills:4Focus: 3/ 3Health: 12/ 12 Leader:
    After Action dice are rolled and any re-rolls are made, Leo may trade one Action die belonging to any hero with an Action die belonging to another hero until the end of the round.
  • StatsMove:3Attack:1Defend:4Skills:3Focus: 4/ 4Health: 11/ 11 Smart:
    At the end of each round, Donnie may either regain 1 Focus or give 1 of his Focus to another hero of his choice (not to exceed that hero's maximum Focus).
  • StatsMove:3Attack:2Defend:3Skills:2Focus: 3/ 3Health: 13/ 13 Loner:
    Raph has 6 Action dice instead of 3. However, he cannot share other heroes' Action Dice. Other heroes may share his dice as usual.
  • StatsMove:4Attack:1Defend:3Skills:3Focus: 2/ 2Health: 12/ 12 Nimble:
    Once per turn, Mikey may move 1 space for free, ignoring terrain and break away rules. Also, terrain moves cost Mikey 1 lewss icon of your choice to use.
  • StatsMove:2Attack:1Defend:4Skills:5Focus: 4/ 4Health: 7/ 7Master:
    Master Spliter may use 2 special moves per round instead of only 1.
  • StatsMove:4Attack:1Defend:3Skills:2Focus: 5/ 5Health: 11/ 11 Beta Tech:
    April receives the Stealth Suit and Gravity Gauntlet special moves in addition to her other moves. These moves do not count against her limit of 1 special move per turn when used.
  • StatsMove:4Attack:2Defend:2Skills:2Focus: 2/ 2Health: 15/ 15 Walk It Off:
    Casey regains Life (but not focus) when he rolls skateboard icons on his Action dice, just as though he had rolled a chi icon.
